GSD.description:
x86/boot: Wrap literal addresses in absolute_pointer()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.7 by commit 0c5fa75ac6ae8711869777d302ac806e749fa2cc. For more details please see the references link.
